name: David Mass
text: They say their dining room is open and they close at 9 but this can't be further from the truth. This exact thing happened two times in a row. We get there to dine in a little after 8 and we are turned away. This time we walked in the door â€¦More

name: Jennifer S
text:
This got 2 stars because the staff was friendly..but other than that, I have nothing else positive to say. We ordered salads, cheese sticks and a large pizza.
Salad bar was next to empty, cheese sticks had cheese only on HALF of each â€¦More

name: Danette H
text: This location was average.  Nobody there but us and we had to ask for a clean table. Waitress was nice and service was speedy.

name: Dustin Smithers
text: 4 stars is based on fast food not food in general,  being said it was one of the better pizza huts it was clean and salad bar was stocked nice. Waitress was very nice and on top of things and young man cooking was neat and freindly. Was a very good lunch and recommended if your in the st.c area

name: Sara Baker
text: Online order. Carry out. Always have order when says will be ready. 5$Menu is awesome. Tastes so good. Cheez it pizza was a flop for our house. Tasted good but texture in middle was soggy mush. Not sure if it was a fluke or was meant to be that way. Still 5starz

name: N2wipes
text: Recently had a mix up on my take out order. I thought I had ordered 2 pizzas they had me down for 3. Since my order was ready I offered to pay for 3 but the manager insisted I take the 3rd for free. He was so nice about it. I'll definitely continue to order from them. Great food great service...thank u

name: YouHavea FriendinMe
text: Great service and very clean. Was traveling from Pennsylvania to Arkansas and did a online order to go so we could run in and get back to driving. They were super quick and the flavor was amazing. Thanks Pizza Hut.

name: Elizabeth Kay Evans Reed
text: Waitress nice cashier looks and facts mean...

name: chad strope
text: We rented the party room. Only $20 for 2 hours. The staff was very helpful. The pizza was amazing and the boneless wings were made to perfection. Two thumbs up...

name: Jennifer
text: Food is good and they deliver way before the time they say they will.

name: Raevyn Knight
text: This is a clean establishment with pleasant staff and is family friendly. You can also get pitchers of beer! I recommend the bacon, parmesan pizza! Hands down the best pizza in the valley! Try it. Promise you'll love it! ðŸ˜˜

text: Food and service was great.  I don't like the idea that your not allowed to order a calzone with the ingredients that you want...even though they make them fresh when you order them?? â€¦More

name: Donna Jackson

name: randy taylor
text: Extremely busy due to St. Clairsville parade and they were short staffed BUT.... the crew working rocked it out like pro's! One server (if my receipt is right his name was Austin) that boy had every table on his own literally full speed â€¦More

name: Well Watcher
text:
My wings were Burnt.
I had to order something else to eat,
The salad bar looked like a hurricane hit it, I also had to fight the flys off my food.
Service was okay.

name: Janet Allen
text: Good pizza, great employees

name: Nicholas HOSS Logan
text: Love their meat lovers thin crust pizza, bread sticks and a cold 2 liter of pepsi. Wide and I tend to call in and pick up our pizza after shopping. Staff is nice and short wait on food. Also easy to get to off 40 or interstate.

name: Chris Sisson
text: Our service was good but the poor family that came in a bit later wasn't even waited on. I don't blame them for walking out without eating. Another family that came in after the other family got served 1st. Total bull. I won't come back to this pizza hut.

name: cecilsmith24
text: Had a party there, pre-ordered the pizza and it was ready when we got there.  Even let us bring in our own drinks (just water and Gatorade).  Staff was friendly even though a manager had just quit.  Back room for parties needs a little work.

name: Kari Jo Carlos
text: Food was great, price was great and the staff was good considering the amount of customer staff ratio. There were a lot of customers and very little staff.

name: Evan Sinn
text: If you're looking for a spiritual journey that cost 5.99, you have come to the right place. Great staff and decent pizza, but the journey keeps me coming back.

name: Robert Besece
text: Not a good experience. I wondered why there where so few people in the pizza hut at this time on a Saturday. I found out.

name: David Nelson
text: Ordered pizza's online. Picked them up and when I got home and opened them i immediately noticed one was missing a topping and neither of them had the correct sauce. I called them and was told they no longer have the sauce or peppers that I â€¦More

text: Great atmosphere,  great people,  excellent food

name: Wendy Willison
text: This was my favorite place to eat as a teenager. Ate here last night with my family and the service was ok but salad bar was old, onions were rotten. Pizza was ok. Bread sticks were the best thing we had. Probably won't ever go back. Will go to Little Caesar's instead.

name: Tabitha Zwirtz

name: Timothy Glenn
text: The restaurant dining room at this location is very tired and needs a restoration. The Pizza was okay. The service was marginal. In general all of Pizza Hut has cheapened their product quality to stay competitive in pricing. I miss the Pizza Hut from 20 years ago.

name: Penny Davis
text: Boy has this place changed. Not nearly as nice as it used to be. Shows the wear and tear of the years. Only one server and one person making food on a Sunday afternoon??? What's that about??? Really need to clean up the place. Won't be eating in there againðŸ˜“
